# Transcript Query Command

Run the transcript-query skill.

## Usage

```
/transcript-query
```

## What It Does

This command invokes the `transcript-query` skill. See the skill documentation for detailed process steps.

## Skill Reference

This command invokes: `@skills/transcript-query`

See `@skills/transcript-query/SKILL.md` for full documentation and `@skills/transcript-query/reference.md` for examples.
